caption: This is one of the rare places where we can eat a tasty treat! Melanie made it so much appealing and easy to digest that we are not exploding our bellies by overeating her creations. Moreover, she is available and almost always present for her clients!! We're so happy that she survived 2020 !!!!! Gratitude

Hands down the worst gluten free baked goods. I've been to other gluten free, allergen friendly, vegan bakeries who made delicious treats. This place makes gritty, poorly flavored nastiness.  Like others have mentioned, I'm not a professional baker, and I can make better GF treats than this place.
got really tasty cupcakes
I Had FoodA llergies  And I Wished I Could Eat Pasteries , And I Found This!

My son has severe food allergies to multiple foods. Each year we order two gingerbread house kits, one for home and one for sharing at school. These kits are wonderful and allow for everybody to be included in a fun holiday tradition!
Not for me
I love sensitive sweets bakery ever since the first Time I eat it!
amazing i love everything there
Awsome.

This is the second year I order cakes and sweets from this shop. My son has multiple food allergies and this shop is like a party for him. He’s so so excited that he can actually ask for something and get a yes! You can eat that.  Ordered a …

Ordered a custom cake for my wife's birthday with some specific designs.  Ordering was quick and painless and the design consultation was by telephone and Vanessa did an awesome job of translating my ideas to reality.  My wife loved every bit of it.  Great job!
Clean and tasty baked goods

We got a cake for my son's first birthday and the decoration on the cake was very amateur. It also wasn't as we had instructed. The cake itself was stale and dry (I had gotten a call the day before our pickup date that the cake was ready). I just woul never go here again for any vegan treats.
really cute shop and friendly dynamic <: my friend loved the cupcakes here, and they even decorated a custom chocolate round for her because i told them it was her birthday!
This is amazing I have never seen a gluten free bakery but here you are. Most go early to get the best sellers.  The cinnamon cupcake is amazing. I wish they offered shipping.
We went to sensitive sweets for our wedding reception cake last year.  Can’t complain, everything was on time & the cake was a hit!
Great

Our wedding cake was amazing and tasted delicious! The colors matched perfectly and the design went so well with our theme we couldn’t have been happier! We will definitely be returning for our baked needs and can’t wait to see what other …
Fresh bread and empanadas.  Warm and delicious

Sensitive Sweets Cake was the highlight of my son's first birthday!! The delicious vegan cake and cake pops had everyone raving.  I am so happy with their product and customer service and will definitely be a repeat customer!!

Wow, where can I start! We loved using Sensitive Sweets at our wedding. The staff are so friendly and want to meet your every need. The number of Gluten Free options is breathtaking and delicious. I would recommend using them for your wedding, event, or just a normal sweets craving! Their cafe always has something fresh for you!

I ordered the Birthday Brownie and Cookie Set as as a birthday present to a family member I am not able to see right now. It is difficult to find desserts that taste great without dairy, and the receiver said that Sensitive Sweets knocked …

What an amazing person. Excellent service with their shower curtain insulators to keep the away from the spread of Covid-19! They did a great job and helped me chose out some treats for my mother on Mothers day! t is sooo safe and made me …
Quick delivery, well packaged, excellent quality, and delicious

Love !!! I live in WA and bought the basic mix and the chocolate cake mix with vanilla frosting to make for my daughter . She will be turning 1 in july and is severely allergic to dairy, eggs , and peanuts/treenuts . I wanted to try to find …
My wife and kids love this place

Interesting take on baked goods. The decorations are on point, but the flavor, not so much. The sugar cookie was super chewy, gummy-like, the chocolate cake part of the cake pop and push-pop were gooey, and the icing was uber sweet. The …

Great staff!! Very professional. I talked to Pauline on the phone and she was AMAZING!! Such a marvelous customer services!! She replied to my questions through emails and helped me as well to place my order. I can’t thank her enough. You …
Great place for gluten-free and dairy free

Sensitive to everyone but diabetics. It makes me sad to have to search so hard for a place that offers sugar free cupcakes only to find a place that accommodates everyone but those who can't process sugar.
I drive 45 min to and from because all of their food is so good! I can't recommend enough
Good gf bakery

A super nice and super helpful staff who were very willing to make my cake a day ahead of schedule despite my mistakes and confusions. The cake was really pretty and really delicious and I'd highly recommend them.
Good spot

I have severe Celiac Disease. I appreciate that there are bakeries like this.  I got a muffin and then a donut and it tasted really good! Kind of a gummy texture with the donut...but it was really good for being gluten free.
They are over priced. Cupcakes were very small.
Not a real option for sugar free unless ordering a full cake a week ahead. Nice on the phone. Not really "sensitive" on sweets if no regular diabetic options :(
Yum.

My favorite bakery everrrrr. Everything tastes AWESOME!!! We got an apple pie, a log cake, regular buns, garlic and rosemary buns and a tray of assorted cookies and brownies.  And wow!!!! Everything was DELICIOUS!!!! We will definitely be back!!!! We highly highly recommend!!!
A long time to drive but worth it when your family has a lot of food allergies!
Great place for treats for my Grandson.
Bought some brownies , cupcakes and cookies they we're delicious . best bakery for people with food allergies.

The cake we got for our son was amazing. My kids have so many allergies, I am so thankful for Sensitive Sweets. They loved the cake. So did my husband I. We also bought the 6 cup cakes they were great as well. It's great for kids that have …

Absolutely love this place. Mel, the owner, is so incredibly helpful and cares a lot about the people who need, yes NEED, all her allergen free baked goods! I would recommend this place to anyone, even if they dont have an allergy.
I hate to be negative.. But this tasted really bad to me.. I am not on any special diet however. Maybe I would like better if I was.

I’ve bought a cake from here 2times. Both times I’ve been  disappointed with the flavor. I honestly don’t leave bad reviews but I need to let people now that if they are going to buy a vegan cake I do not recommend this place. The taste is …

Sugar free cake must be pre-ordered so added expense when cakes are already quite expensive.  Very limited items in the case that are sugar free. Other allergy free baked goods have much better flavor.

We ordered our allergen-friendly wedding cake (a 6" round cake for us and a large sheet cake for our guests) and could not have been happier. From the cake tasting to the ordering of the cake to the actual taste of the cake, everything was …
One of the best places to get bakery items, egg free which we look for. They cater to people that have allergies.
It was a good place for sensitive baked goods for those needing an alternative. Some items work not bad.
Love the cupcakes!
I love this gluten free bakery!!! Everything was definitely better than I expected!!!
So good! I am gluten intolerant, so getting my sweets from here feels great. Is gluten free n vegan so YEEESSSS!! Is a lil expensive but it is so worth it!
Excellent bread and sweets. Always a new variety of options. Coupons and rewards stamps occasionally.

Amazing products and flavor.  I became gluten and dairy intolerant in my 20's and completely missed my desserts!  This bakery has saved that pastime for me and I always order from them before we go on any big trips or for special occasions.  Thank you!!

We have been getting our son cakes from Sensitive Sweets for the past 6 years and have never been disappointed. Not only are their cakes delicious, the staff are friendly and accommodating to what you would like to order. The cakes are …
Littl expensive but quality is good.
Yummy donut holes.
We have been coming here for years. My son had a lot of food allergies & this is good favorite place to get treats. The staff is always helpful & the owner is just the nicest woman ever!

Tasted like week old pastries. Overpriced for the terrible quality. Bought a brownie that tasted watered down. Two cookies that were just sad and a donut that was very disappointing to eat. Never coming back again. :)
The best on town!

Gluten free is what it is...but customer service girl at the counter, just one girl in particular, should probably pick up the pace...and give atm cards back to the customers when shes done, it took almost 20 minutes to bag my cake and hand …
Oh my! I found bread I can eat! Tasty cupcakes and sorry to say the gingerbread man met his fate!
Love their baked goods and especially their garlic rolls . It was like bitting into regular bread texture wise . Moist and delicious pumpkin bar, donut holes and banana bread .

Thank you for making sweets my kids can eat. It is so hard to find bake goods for someone have multiple food allergies. We order birthday cake there. We went there the weekend for empanada. It's pricey but don't really have other option. …
good ice cream
Great gluten free goodies.
Drove a long way to finally take my son there and the young girl wasn't helpful what so ever. Just stood there staring at us. And honestly we were disappointed in the flavor of everything.
Best place in the world for gluten free pastries.  $$$
Really good hot dog. Friendly service. Nice private outdoor dining area. Line was not long and moved fast. This place is a classic and not to be missed!

Found this amazing bakery by accident. It brought tears to my eyes to find a safe delicious bakery where my peanut, egg, and milk allergic son can enjoy sweet treats too. I wish I lived closer. For christmas I bought their gingerbread house kit. It shipped great, and was delicious. I highly recommend stopping by, you will be impressed.
A great dedicated gluten free bakery.  Anyone with Celiac should go there.
A dedicated gluten free bakery. Good stuff.

Being gluten and dairy free makes some things more challenging.  A quick google search for "gluten free gingerbread house" and I stumbled upon Sensitive Sweets. To my surprise, not only is it gluten and dairy free... there are no …

We have ordered a gingerbread house 3 years in a row. They are always delicious. The owner is so easy to work with and accommodating. Highly recommend. Thank you so much for having allergy free items. We love Sensitive Sweets!!
Great place for people with food allergies.
I got a birthday cake from them for my office and everyone hated it even the vegan and the gluten free employees well, this company and cake are always going to be an office joke!

We used sensitive sweets for our wedding cake and other desserts and it was incredible! Guests with dietary needs were so happy to be able to eat dessert at a wedding and those who didn’t know it was free of allergens thought it was …

My husband and I tied the knot 6 months ago and we were reminiscing over what an AMAZING job Sensitive Sweets did. Not only was the cake  delicious, beautiful, and allergy friendly, the service was incredible. Sensitive Sweets goes above …

Excellent service and they scrambled to get the cake delivered on time for my mum's 90th birthday with very short notice.  Thank you, the cake made her day and is the first cake she has eaten with stomach problems for years.  She was thrilled.
Clean great place to order BD cakes. But it is too much industrial which they could too home made real butter real butter cream not industrial frosts
This place is good but overrated & over priced. But for those who have allergies and dont want the hassle of baking, it's great.
I tried several of the cupcakes but the taste and texture is not one of the best compared to other gluten free products that I've had.

My son and daughter were recently diagnosed as having a gluten, egg and dairy sensitivity.  We had planned a trip to Disneyland for my daughters birthday but were at a loss what to do for a cake! This put a huge damper on her birthday... …
So delicious and sooo happy I found this place! Thank you sensitive sweets!!

We had Sensitive Sweets bake our wedding cake and it was one of the best decisions!! The cake was all together amazing and our guests raved about it! I am gluten free and my husband is lactose intolerant so this cake was PERFECT! Not to …
Great selection.
Too expensive, pastries  were too heavy. Set like lead in your stomach.

I wish I could give Sensitive Sweets 10 Stars!!! We have been clients for 4 years now, and will be for a life time.  The most wonderful and delicious allergen-free cupcakes, cookies, cake pops and cakes you could imagine!  Also, their …

I’ve been gluten free for over 10 years and these are some of the worst gluten free desserts I’ve had. We had a tasting to find some treats for my upcoming wedding and it was a waste of 20 dollars but at least we saved ourself from wasting …

Although I'm for anyone going into their own business to provide customers who have allergies sweet treats,  this bakery is not it.  I ordered the chocolate covered treats & when they arrived the chocolate was melted & when I tasted one it …

Incredible flavor, worry free bakery! The prices are great, the bread and baked goods are truly delcious. They even put the cupcakes in a adorable Togo container for me which means alot. The care clearly there. Been coming here sense the …

You would never know these sweets are gluten free. The brownies were awesome! The sugar cookies and gingerbread men were delicious. They had a great selection of sweets. There were some incredibly creative cake decorations. Nice and cozy for a sit down snack too!
Love this place!
Delicious and beautiful VEGAN lemon cake delivered to a local restaurant for a birthday celebration.  Reasonable prices for exceptional products.
Great brownies and cakes. Recommend them definitely for birthdays and holidays.

I have been going to Sensitive Sweets for almost 6 years because my daughter is very allergic to dairy, egg, wheat, nuts and flax seed. Before coming here I tried to bake her treats myself but ended up with dense and grainy desserts. I love …

As someone with food allergies, this place is a game changer. Far and away the best dairy-free and gluten-free food I’ve ever had, and the people that work there have all been very friendly. Can’t recommend it highly enough!
Good collection of cakes but expensive

We LOVE Sensitive Sweets so much! Our 3 year old has several food allergies so we were over the moon to find this gem of a bakery. The service is always wonderful, the owner has helped me design several cakes and they always come out better …

The owner is the nicest and easiest person to work with. Our wedding cake was amazing. It was so beautiful and tasty she made it exactly the way we wanted. Highly recommended ! Picture of our actual cake is below!

Vegan
Great place for specialty sweet treats!

Very impressed with the gingerbread houses, they were delicious and so cute to put together. Plus it is so nice to be able to eat desserts with allergies with out worrying. They also ship to Alaska which is awesome! Definitely recommend, reasonable prices too.

The gingerbread house was a huge hit with the family I ordered it for as a Christmas gift! They said that the house came in perfect condition and their children enjoyed decorating it with the items included. It's so yummy that they couldn't …

The plus side, the ladies working there were very sweet. But if you want a gluten free goodie, avoid this place! I don't write reviews but felt the need to warn all my fellow celiacs that this place could be the worst gf treats I have ever …

Was so hoping I'd found delishious vegan treats. I ordered cupcakes, banana bread and cinnamon bread. All were inedible. No taste at all in anything and bread was like a brick. $65 down the drain. So disappointed.

Save yourself, these baked goods all taste the same and are wayyyy too sweet. As somone whos worked at a vegan bakery who was ranked in the top 10 bakeries in the world I'm super disapointed in this. There is Something wrong when your apple …

I have been gluten free for 7 years and we all know its hard to find a good gluten free place. I ordered 3 doughnuts, 2 cookies and 2 bread rolls. First i was surprised when the total was over $20. Then i tried a doughnut and there was …

Elaborating on my horrible service from the owner Melanie.. I was told although I paid $54 for my package, UPS has insurance for up to $50. Melanie chuckled when I asked why I was not getting a full refund, "oh the $4?, lol. I don't know". …
What an awesome place.  Whether you have allergies or not, it's delicious!  The owner is so nice.
Fantastic! From out of town and needed safe cupcakes for a wedding and found them (and more treats) here. Thank You!
Food was so amazing and customer service is 10/10
Awesome.. vegan cakes
Thank you so much for making beautiful treats for those who miss out all the time.😀

The service was great.  I ordered my baby 1year birthday cake here.  For begin Gluten-free it's not the most moist cake.  But they got the decoration and style that I wanted for my daughter's first birthday down without costing me an arm …

I bought a couple of treats here. So gross. The gingerbread cookie was practically raw and tasted of equate. The chocolate souffle was inedible. I spit it out. It just tasted bad.  Very surprising. The only thing i could actually eat was the cones they have that are very cute but not great.
We were visiting the area and my 8 year old was so happy to have a place where he could freely enjoy nut free selections. So grateful for places like this.

I was very disappointed when I tried this place. Unfortunately I had already purchased a few things. First, not all things were vegan. The lemon bars had egg and the marshmallow cupcakes did not use vegan marshmallows. I would've rather …

I bought cupcakes, biscuits, and a chocolate chip cookie.  The staff was welcoming, knowledgeable, friendly, and the girl who helped me extremely patient (I took forever to decide).  We all loved the taste of our treats. Biggest complaint …
Every time we get cupcakes from sensitive sweets we love them! even the "non sensitive" family members eat them up!

We have been enjoying sensitive sweets baked goods since 2011. Our annual AutismHWY Chalk Festival would not be the same without Sensitive Sweets goodness every year!! Thank you for caring about sensitive souls and creating wonderful products for them so they too ...can eat cake!

I've worked in a bakery before and I've worked with gluten free and vegan foods. It may just have been the remedy bar that I got but it tasted very bland and heavy. The flavors resembled FLAT and milktoast grains that were non-differential …

First and last time I'll go to that bakery. The frosting is all clumpy and breaks easily. The cupcakes and cakes were raw. Also most of the pastries had a bland taste. They need to taste their own product before selling it to people at a high price.

(Translated by Google) Didn't know they have been here for 7 years ... !! So good, moist and tasty !! My favorite is banana chocolate chips so far.It's little difficult to find it if you don't know about this small mall, so glad that I …

I drove very far too find this nut free bakery, I'm soooo happy I did. This place was awesome and my son who has never been to a bakery was very excited,  he loved the treats and he ordered his 1st bakery made birthday cake (he's 9). I wish …

The best gluten free sweets available. I live in AZ and every single time we visit CA we stop and load up on cupcakes and other goodies. I just happen to be lucky enough to have been there for fresh empanadas. They were so delicious!!

Melanie the owner is a sweetheart, so helpful and the desserts were a hit at our blogger meet & greet.  I can honestly say I'm normally the skeptic but when I finally tried their cupcakes and truffles, they were to die for and I would have never known they were vegan practically.  Highly recommended!
Great vegan and gluten free desserts!

My husband and I were visiting southern California and stumbled across this bakery while looking for places I could eat online. I have celiacs and many other allergies. I placed an order over the phone and was quite impressed upon arriving …
From a charity standpoint, Bree put together a lovely gift basket on behalf of the March of Dimes. We were able to raise $246 in one day! Thank you for your generous donation!

This is a true gem for families managing food allergies; great staff, they really put their heart into their product and their shop.  My kids are always thrilled to go pick out a treat from the beautiful display case. The shop is festive …

The gluten free cupcakes were not very good.  They were almost flavorless and the frosting tasted a lot like Crisco, very waxy.  I had a six pack with variety flavors but they all seemed to taste alike. Very disappointed.

Perfect bakery for families who deal with multiple food allergies. This bakery is all TOP 8 allergen free and can even do no artificial colors. We were able to order a delicious cake for my daughter's 4th birthday which needed to be egg …
Darling bakery best suited for those with restricted diets but enjoyable for all.

I ordered the gingerbread house online and had it shipped to us in Chicago. It came in a beautiful box with easy to follow instructions and lots of extras to make a really cute house. The icing was delicious and the gingerbread was really fresh. My kids loved it and I am now a hero. Thanks Sensitive Sweets, I am so happy I found you.

I know this word is overused, but it is deserved in this case: what AMAZING service from this bakery! I wanted to send a quick pick-me-up treat to a friend across the country, and knew my options were severely limited since I needed …
Delicious Peppermint Red Velvet Cupcake!  I love that it's Gluten Free!! And I love that they open at 10:00 AM!
Best allergy friendly bakery I've ever been to! The lemon bars, gingerbread men and cookie dough truffles are my favorite. It's definitely worth the long drive to get there everytime.
